changeAndCreate.description: A platform focused on personal development through wellness retreats, self-care practices, and health consulting.
offerings: Workshops on self-love and routine building
Mindfulness and physical activities (yoga, meditation, hiking)
goals: Empower individuals to improve their lives through scientific knowledge and practical coaching

philosophy.musicPhilosophy: Music is more than just tunes; it's a way to connect deeply with our emotions and with each other.
philosophy.setDescription: Her sets are more than a random collection of tracks. MARADOCA takes you on a journey to freedom. With increasing energy and speed, she helps you break free from genre limitations.

engagement: Interactive performances at retreats and festivals
Music that encourages introspection and emotional connection
Uniting a diverse audience to feel, dance, and connect
audienceInteraction.goal: To use music as a medium to explore emotions, promote well-being, and connect with others on a deeper level.

artistDescription: MARADOCA, a rising artist based in Leipzig, Germany, has burst onto the scene with a fresh perspective. Mixing melodic, tropical, and cosmic elements in a progressive flow, she weaves stories of deep feelings, creating vibes that resonate straight from her soul. For MARADOCA, music is more than just tunes; it's a way to connect deeply with our emotions and with each other.
